name.de: Summon Ball of Great Chef Muffrin
name.fr: Balle d'invocation de Grand Chef Muffrin
name.jp: ジャイアント・マフリン・シェフ召喚のオーブ

description.en: Allows you to summon a Great Chef Muffrin. To use, double click it, and select an area on the ground nearby to summon the Giant.
description.ar: Allows you to summon a Great Chef Muffrin. To use, double click it, and select an area on the ground nearby to summon the Giant.
description.br: Irá invocar um Grande Chef Muffrin. Para usar, clique vezes no item e depois clique no chão para invocar o Gigante.
description.cns: 能召唤厨子麻普的魔法晶球
description.fi: Allows you to summon a Great Chef Muffrin. To use, double click it, and select an area on the ground nearby to summon the Giant.
description.fil: Allows you to summon a Great Chef Muffrin. To use, double click it, and select an area on the ground nearby to summon the Giant.
description.fr: Invoque un Grand Chef Muffrin pour une heure. Double-cliquez puis sélectionner une zone au sol pour l'utiliser.
description.id: Memungkinkan Anda memanggil Great Chef Muffrin. Untuk menggunakannya, klik dua kali, dan pilih area di tanah terdekat untuk memanggil Giant.
description.it: Allows you to summon a Great Chef Muffrin. To use, double click it, and select an area on the ground nearby to summon the Giant.
description.jp: ジャイアント・マフリン・シェフを召喚する魔法のオーブ。(召喚してから1時間が過ぎるとモンスターは自動的に消えます)
description.kr: 취사반장 머푸린을 소환 하는 마법 구슬. 사용하려면 두 번 클릭한 다음 자이언트를 호출할 영역을 선택합니다.
description.nl: Allows you to summon a Great Chef Muffrin. To use, double click it, and select an area on the ground nearby to summon the Giant.
description.pl: Allows you to summon a Great Chef Muffrin. To use, double click it, and select an area on the ground nearby to summon the Giant.
description.ru: Шар призыва маэстро Кромсатти. Дважды щелкните по шару, а затем укажите место на земле, где должен появиться монстр.
description.sp: Te permite invocar a un Gran Chef Muffrin. Para usarlo, haz doble click y selecciona el lugar donde quieras invocarlo.
description.sw: Allows you to summon a Great Chef Muffrin. To use, double click it, and select an area on the ground nearby to summon the Giant.
description.th: ให้คุณเรียกGreat Chef Muffrinในการใช้งาน ให้ดับเบิ้ลคลิกและเลือกพื้นที่ที่อยู่ใกล้เคียงเพื่ออัญเชิญไจแอนท์
description.tw: 能召喚廚子麻普的魔法晶球。要使用，請雙點擊它，然後選擇地面上的一個區域來召喚更大隻的。
description.vi: Cho phép bạn triệu hồi một Muffrin đầu bếp vĩ đại. Để sử dụng, hãy nhấp đúp vào nó và chọn một khu vực trên mặt đất gần đó để triệu hồi Người khổng lồ.
